name: 謝東儒
objective: 討論當使用計算機來解決數學問題時的能力及限制,並介紹相關改進或解決的方法. 主題內容包含: (1) 誤差 (2) 數值演算法 (3) 數學計算軟體 (4) 浮點運算 (5) 矩陣運算 (6) 多項式內插法 (7) 數值積分 (8) 非線性方程式 (9) 初值問題。
schedule:
1  MATLAB Fundamentals
2  Computational Errors
3  Floating-Point Computation
4  Matrix Computation
5  Gaussian Elimination
6  LU Factorization
7  QR Factorization
8  Iterative (Gauss-Seidel)
9  4/13 (Monday) Midterm
10 Least Squares Approximation
11 Polynomial Interpolation (Lagrange)
12 Polynomial Interpolation (Newton)
13 Polynomial Interpolation (Piecewise)
14 Numerical Integration
15 Richardson's, Romberg Integration
16 Adaptive Quadrature
17 Nonlinear Equations
18 6/15 (Monday) Final Exam
